item.title: COMBAT 23
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Combat ’23, an intercollegiate meet was conducted in the premises of SSM College of Arts and Science on 21.03.2023. A total of around 393 participants and 22 faculty members from…
item.content:encoded:
Combat ’23, an intercollegiate meet was conducted in the premises of SSM College of Arts and Science on 21.03.2023. A total of around 393 participants and 22 faculty members from 13 colleges located in Dindigul, Madurai, Theni and Palani took part in various competitions like photography, short film, math rangoli, just a minute and cook without fire. All the students participated in the competitions enthusiastically and exhibited their skills and talents and bagged prizes. Madurai Gandhi N.M.R. College for Women won the overall championship award. Principal, Dr. N. Sampathkumar gave the valedictory address and Dr. G. Shanmugam, Dean of Science and Humanities, SSMIET, distributed the prizes to the winners. The meet was planned and organized by Professor Dr. Karuppanasamy of Commerce, Mr. R. Sudhanesh of Computer Science, and Dr. K. Sakthivel of Biochemistry.

Memorandum of Understanding was signed between SSM College of Arts and Science and Confederation of Indian Industries (Young India). The secretary of SSMAS, Dr. D. Senthil Kumaran, presided over the meeting and the MoU was signed by Mr. Surya Raguraam of Young India and Dr. N. Sampathkumar, Principal SSMCAS in the presence of Mr. Vinoth Balachandar, Co-chair, Young India. The event was organized by Mr. A. Edison, AP, English and Mr. S. Gowtham, Assistant Physical Director. It was attended by all the faculty members and the students of SSMCAS.

item.title: COMBAT 23
item.dc:creator: admin

item.title: Inauguration of ‘Tamil Ilakkiya Mandram’ – தமிழ் இலக்கிய மன்ற தொடக்க விழா
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: ‘Tamil Ilakkiya Mandram’ was inaugurated in the campus. Secretary, Dr. D. Senthilkumaran delivered the Presidential address and the Chief guest of the day was Dr. O. Muthaiah, Head of the…
item.content:encoded: ‘Tamil Ilakkiya Mandram’ was inaugurated in the campus. Secretary, Dr. D. Senthilkumaran delivered the Presidential address and the Chief guest of the day was Dr. O. Muthaiah, Head of the Department of Tamil, Gandhigram Rural Institute, Gandhigram. Faculty members and students of all the departments participated in the inauguration. Mrs. M. Geetha, Assistant Professor in Tamil introduced the office bearers. Dr. M. Deepajothi, Assistant Professor in Tamil delivered the vote of thanks.

item.title: Inauguration of Anti-Drug Club – போதை மருந்து எதிர்ப்பு மையம்
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Drug Addiction Awareness Cell was inaugurated and presided over by our Principal Dr. N.Sampathkumar. Dr. S. Gandhi, psychiatrist and district head explained the causes and after effects of drug addiction.…
item.content:encoded: Drug Addiction Awareness Cell was inaugurated and presided over by our Principal Dr. N.Sampathkumar. Dr. S. Gandhi, psychiatrist and district head explained the causes and after effects of drug addiction. All the students took a pledge against drug addiction. Mr. R.Sudhanesh, Assistant Professor in Computer Science and the coordinators of the cell have made all the arrangements.

item.title: Inauguration of Women Empowerment Cell – பெண்கள் அதிகார அமைப்பு துவக்கம்
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The inaugural ceremony of Women Empowerment Cell on 3 rd February 2023 commenced with the lighting of lamp by a group of dignitaries. Ms. S. Madhumanjari, Public Well Revival Movement,…
item.content:encoded: The inaugural ceremony of Women Empowerment Cell on 3 rd February 2023 commenced with the lighting of lamp by a group of dignitaries. Ms. S. Madhumanjari, Public Well Revival Movement, graced the occasion as the chief guest. The arrangements were done by the faculty coordinators Dr.M.Deepajothi and Mrs. K. Muthu Nagapradeepa. Faculty members and the students of all the department were present in the inauguration ceremony.

item.title: Inauguration of Entrepreneurship Development Cell – தொழில் முனைவோர் மேம்பாட்டு பயிற்சி
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: A refresher camp on Entrepreneurship Development was conducted on behalf of SSM College of Arts and Science and Madurai Kamaraj University. In presence of our Principal, Dr. N. Sampathkumar, the…
item.content:encoded: A refresher camp on Entrepreneurship Development was conducted on behalf of SSM College of Arts and Science and Madurai Kamaraj University. In presence of our Principal, Dr. N. Sampathkumar, the coordinator of Madurai Kamaraj University, Mr. Ramachandran, presided over the function. The chief guest, Mr. K. Sankaralingam, Founder and CEO of Madurai Greenscart Organization, addressed the gathering on the topic ‘New Voucher Plan’. The function was organized by Dr. Karuppanasamy Assistant Professor of Commerce and it was attended by all the faculty members and students.

item.title: National Seminar – Muthamizh Camp / முத்தமிழ் முகாம் – தேசிய கருத்தரங்கம்
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: A national seminar was organized in SSM College of Arts and Science in collaboration with TamilNadu Iyal, Isai, Nadaga Mandram. Dr. R. Karunanidhi, Assistant Professor in Tamil, Nandhanam Arts and…
item.content:encoded: A national seminar was organized in SSM College of Arts and Science in collaboration with TamilNadu Iyal, Isai, Nadaga Mandram. Dr. R. Karunanidhi, Assistant Professor in Tamil, Nandhanam Arts and Science College presided over the function. Dr. P. Shakthijothi and Dr. M. Sattanathan and Dr. R. Geetha spoke on the three divisions of Tamil Literature. Principal, Dr. N. Sampathkumar welcomed the chief guests and Mrs. M. Geetha delivered the vote of thanks.
